name: Joe Ekiert
technicalSkills: JavaScript and TypeScript frameworks, React, Node, Express
Web socket development with Pusher and Firebase
Test writing with Jest and React Testing Library
State management with Jotai, Redux, and React Query
Building high quality user experiences with React components and CSS/SASS
Event tracking and understanding product health via New Relic and Datadog
Terraforming k8s pods and deploying to them via gitops.
Excellent interpersonal skills and an outstanding ability to maintain team morale

experience.description: Tech planned and led the implementation of a client-side Observability initiative for the Casino Web product.
Worked alongside architecture to integrate express middlewares that standardized a number of vital actions.
Played a vital role in developing the process for expanding the Casino Web product to new jurisdictions.
Built the initial versions of vital lobby UI components for the Casino Web product that ranks either #1 or #2 in all legal locations (and #1 nationally as late as early 2024).
Started up and led weekly Casino Web Operations meetings.
Built an angular‑meteor‑powered web portal for Dentists to create and manage their excess capacity.
Constructed an iOS and Android mobile app utilizing React Native for patients.
Managed all code reviews and merges for feature builds.
Sole developer of in-house budget tracking software using Ruby on Rails for back-end and Angular.js for front-end.
Part of the team that migrated away from Ruby on Rails to relying on Angular.js for client-side UX while maintaining the existing Rails backend.
Broke down one of the platform applications from traditional MVC into controller/model driven api. Helping to unify platform user experiences into a single application.
Assisted in conforming site experience of various user roles to follow accessibility standards.
Constructed the shop.js embedded script that provided retailers with an API for rendering products as well as hooking into various customer-triggered events.
Built the initial iteration of the Shoppable Dashboard (retailer tool to manage products to be offered) with CodeIgniter framework.
Developed the embedded checkout views for enterprise users that redirected customers to a 72Lux hosted UX.
Built a CMS platform that allowed for the expedited creation of marketing pages and full-featured web pages.
Developed multiple marketing iOS applications for the iPad and iPhone.
